data.job_description:
At Medix, we are dedicated to creating opportunities for talent through our Healthcare, Scientific and Information Technology divisions. Our dedicated recruiters offer a personalized service to make sure we truly understand your employment needs.

Partner with Medix, and you will experience the multiple benefits our company has to offer. We will hold a personal consultation with you to understand your skills and aspirations! Our placement services provide flexibility to accommodate your schedule and needs, offering contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire positions.

Overview:

Medix is currently seeking an experienced Help Desk Analyst.

Job Responsibilities
• Monitoring and responding to calls on the NSH Help Desk in a courteous, professional manner
• Troubleshooting end user issues while providing alternative solutions to problems and proactively enhancing application design and implementation
• Providing level 1-2 support for organizational applications with minimal supervision
• Utilizing help desk ticketing system to track issues and document internal procedures
• Providing new and existing user access in a Windows AD environment as well as in company specific applications
• Work within a metrics/KPI driven environment
• Participate in PC imaging and deployment
• Participate in rotating after hours on-call support
• Travel requirements limited
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent experience
• Experience in a Help Desk/Customer Support role is required
• Previous experience working with a ticketing system
• Ability to support end users over the phone, in person, or remotely
• Strong desktop support skills, experience supporting remote users, and excellent interpersonal skills
• Experience in a Citrix a plus, experience in Meditech a plus
• Excellent communication skills over the phone and over email
• Self-motivated team player able to multitask and troubleshoot on misc. projects and issues in a fast paced environment
Benefits:

In order to be eligible for health benefits, you must be employed for 30 days and must average 30 hours per week over your first four weeks on assignment. If you become eligible and take action to enroll, you will be covered no earlier than 60 days into your assignment, depending on plan selection(s).

As a contract employee with Medix, you can choose to enroll in our Benefits Program during your eligibility period and enjoy:
• 401(k) Retirement Plan (After 6+ months of service, during a 401k enrollment period)
• Medical, dental and vision plans with The American Worker, as well as three Major Medical Plan options!
• Prescription Programs
• Short Term Disability Insurance
• Term Life Insurance Plan

Compensation: Dependent upon experience

Apply Today!

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent experience
Experience in a Help Desk/Customer Support role is required
Previous experience working with a ticketing system
Ability to support end users over the phone, in person, or remotely
Strong desktop support skills, experience supporting remote users, and excellent interpersonal skills
